plugins.name: removeDoctype
plugins.description: removes doctype declaration

plugins.name: removeXMLProcInst
plugins.description: removes XML processing instructions

plugins.name: removeComments
plugins.description: removes comments

plugins.name: removeMetadata
plugins.description: removes <metadata>

plugins.name: removeXMLNS
plugins.description: removes xmlns attribute (for inline svg, disabled by default)

plugins.name: removeEditorsNSData
plugins.description: removes editors namespaces, elements and attributes

plugins.name: cleanupAttrs
plugins.description: cleanups attributes from newlines, trailing and repeating spaces

plugins.name: minifyStyles
plugins.description: minifies styles and removes unused styles based on usage data

plugins.name: cleanupIDs
plugins.description: removes unused IDs and minifies used

plugins.name: prefixIds
plugins.description: prefix IDs

plugins.name: removeRasterImages
plugins.description: removes raster images (disabled by default)

plugins.name: removeUselessDefs
plugins.description: removes elements in <defs> without id

plugins.name: cleanupNumericValues
plugins.description: rounds numeric values to the fixed precision, removes default ‘px’ units

plugins.name: cleanupListOfValues
plugins.description: rounds list of values to the fixed precision

plugins.name: convertColors
plugins.description: converts colors: rgb() to #rrggbb and #rrggbb to #rgb

plugins.name: removeUnknownsAndDefaults
plugins.description: removes unknown elements content and attributes, removes attrs with default values

plugins.name: removeNonInheritableGroupAttrs
plugins.description: removes non-inheritable group’s presentational attributes

plugins.name: removeUselessStrokeAndFill
plugins.description: removes useless stroke and fill attributes

plugins.name: removeViewBox
plugins.description: removes viewBox attribute when possible

plugins.name: cleanupEnableBackground
plugins.description: remove or cleanup enable-background attribute when possible

plugins.name: removeHiddenElems
plugins.description: removes hidden elements (zero sized, with absent attributes)

plugins.name: removeEmptyText
plugins.description: removes empty <text> elements

plugins.name: convertShapeToPath
plugins.description: converts basic shapes to more compact path form

plugins.name: convertEllipseToCircle
plugins.description: converts non-eccentric <ellipse>s to <circle>s

plugins.name: moveElemsAttrsToGroup
plugins.description: moves elements attributes to the existing group wrapper

plugins.name: moveGroupAttrsToElems
plugins.description: moves some group attributes to the content elements

plugins.name: collapseGroups
plugins.description: collapses useless groups

plugins.name: convertPathData
plugins.description: optimizes path data: writes in shorter form, applies transformations

plugins.name: convertTransform
plugins.description: collapses multiple transformations and optimizes it

plugins.name: removeEmptyAttrs
plugins.description: removes empty attributes

plugins.name: removeEmptyContainers
plugins.description: removes empty container elements

plugins.name: mergePaths
plugins.description: merges multiple paths in one if possible

plugins.name: removeUnusedNS
plugins.description: removes unused namespaces declaration

plugins.name: sortDefsChildren
plugins.description: Sorts children of <defs> to improve compression

plugins.name: removeTitle
plugins.description: removes <title>

plugins.name: removeDesc
plugins.description: removes <desc>

plugins.name: removeElementsByAttr
plugins.description: removes arbitrary elements by ID or className (disabled by default)

plugins.name: addClassesToSVGElement
plugins.description: adds classnames to an outer <svg> element

plugins.name: addAttributesToSVGElement
plugins.description: adds attributes to an outer <svg> element

plugins.name: removeOffCanvasPaths
plugins.description: removes elements that are drawn outside of the viewbox (disabled by default)

plugins.name: reusePaths
plugins.description: Finds <path> elements with the same d, fill, and stroke, and converts them to <use> elements referencing a single <path> def.
